item.title: U.S. Says It Has Unlocked iPhone Without Apple
item.description: Published: March 2016 URL: https://www.nytimes.com/2016/03/29/technology/apple-iphone-fbi-justice-department-case.html Abstract: The Justice Department announcement, in a court filing, ends an immediate legal battle over the San Bernardino shooting case but raises questions about Appleâ€™s security.
